name: SWHOOT
description:
A simple shooter game. avoid red thingies. You have one life.

spoilers(explains how is connected to theme):

Game Play: At start you need to kill atleast 6 enemies, then you need to die (failure for progress), after that avoid the red ghosts and pickup the 10 orange thingies. After that you go to the middle and step into the portal. you kill the boss without touching him or his projectiles. YOU WIN!

Story: You are sent to a battle and after you died you understand how horrible the are the things you did so you help the guard he opens the portal and you stop yourself.
